gameplay: Click the playbutton and for large squares will appear (you won't miss them)
I will go fist and press a button and you will hear a sound (Protip: Use headphones!)
When I'm done it's your tur to click the exact same button as I
It you did it correctly I will go again, but this time add another button to the sequence
And this will go on, and on, and on, until you make a mistake and the game ends
